segments.text: You'll love this . It's a chick drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's that supposed to mean â€” that it's weak ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that too . I mean that it's kind of sweet . See if you can guess what's in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . You really know your booze ... So I guess you know what's in the salsa , too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fresh tomatoes , green and white onions ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't tell me you're a salsa expert , too !
segments.speaker: S1
